Colorkit

A Compass extension for building color schemes in Sass.

Home Color Library Color Scheme Use

Greens

Green Tint Stack
Color Variable Hex Code
$green #008800
$green--tint-1 #269926
$green--tint-2 #4CAB4C
$green--tint-3 #72BD72
$green--tint-4 #99CF99
$green--tint-5 #BFE1BF
$green--tint-6 #E5F3E5
Green Tone Stack
Color Variable Hex Code
$green #008800
$green--tone-1 #138613
$green--tone-2 #268526
$green--tone-3 #398439
$green--tone-4 #4C834C
$green--tone-5 #608260
$green--tone-6 #738073
Green Shade Stack
Color Variable Hex Code
$green #008800
$green--shade-1 #007300
$green--shade-2 #005F00
$green--shade-3 #004A00
$green--shade-4 #003600
$green--shade-5 #002200
$green--shade-6 #000D00
